verses.verse: I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> thou canst <S%H3201>do<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> thing, and that <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4209>thought<s%> can be <S%H1219>withheld<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> thee.

Who <S%H4310><s%> is <S%H2088>he<s%> that <S%H5956>hideth<s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge?<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> have I <S%H5046>uttered<s%> that I <S%H995>understood<s%> <S%H3808>not;<s%> things too <S%H6381>wonderful<s%> <S%H4480>for<s%> me, which I <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3808>not.<s%>
Hear, <S%H8085><s%> I beseech <S%H4994>thee,<s%> and <S%H595>I<s%> will <S%H1696>speak:<s%> I will <S%H7592>demand<s%> of thee, and <S%H3045>declare<s%> thou unto me.
I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> of thee by the <S%H8088>hearing<s%> of the <S%H241>ear:<s%> but <S%H6258>now<s%> mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H7200>seeth<s%> thee.

And it <S%H1961>was<s%> so, that <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H347>Job,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H8489>Temanite,<s%> My <S%H639>wrath<s%> is <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against thee, and against thy <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7453>friends:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> ye have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H413>of<s%> me the thing that is <S%H3559>right,<s%> as my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> hath.

Therefore <S%H3947>take<s%> unto you <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H347>Job,<s%> and offer <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H1157>for<s%> yourselves a burnt <S%H5930>offering;<s%> and my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> shall <S%H6419>pray<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> you: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H6440>him<s%> will I <S%H5375>accept:<s%> <S%H1115>lest<s%> I <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> you after your <S%H5039>folly,<s%> in <S%H3588>that<s%> ye have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H413>of<s%> me the thing which is <S%H3559>right,<s%> like my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H347>Job.<s%>

So <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H8489>Temanite<s%> and <S%H1085>Bildad<s%> the <S%H7747>Shuhite<s%> and <S%H6691>Zophar<s%> the <S%H5284>Naamathite<s%> <S%H1980>went,<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> according <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>commanded<s%> <S%H413><s%> them: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> also <S%H5375>accepted<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H347>Job.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H347>Job,<s%> when he <S%H6419>prayed<s%> <S%H1157>for<s%> his <S%H7453>friends:<s%> also the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3254>gave<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4932>twice<s%> as much as he had <S%H3605>before.<s%> <S%H834><s%>

Then <S%H935>came<s%> there <S%H413>unto<s%> him <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H269>sisters,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> they that had been of his <S%H3045>acquaintance<s%> <S%H6440>before,<s%> and did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him in his <S%H1004>house:<s%> and they <S%H5110>bemoaned<s%> him, and <S%H5162>comforted<s%> him <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him: every <S%H376>man<s%> also <S%H5414>gave<s%> him a piece of <S%H7192>money,<s%> <S%H259><s%> and every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H259>an<s%> <S%H5141>earring<s%> of <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

So the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the latter <S%H319>end<s%> of <S%H347>Job<s%> more than his <S%H4480>beginning:<s%> <S%H7225><s%> for he <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1581>camels,<s%> and a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6776>yoke<s%> of <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and a <S%H505>thousand<s%> she <S%H860>asses.<s%>

And he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>first,<s%> <S%H3224>Jemima;<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>second,<s%> <S%H7103>Kezia;<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H7992>third,<s%> <S%H7163>Keren-happuch.<s%>

And in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> were <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> so <S%H3303>fair<s%> as the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H347>Job:<s%> and their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> their <S%H251>brethren.<s%>

After <S%H310><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H853>and<s%> his <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> even <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
